thread.title: Danielle Kestin
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Danielle Kestin

author: Danielle Kestin
title: Danielle Kestin
text: I had my car collected by the garage, the service from them was exceptional. I was called by servicing stop saying that the service flagged up repairs. I was Quote: d over Â£400 for the service and repair to be then told by the garage when it was brought back that they would have charged half of that if I went directly through them. They add a massive markup so if you are sure your car will need repairing, do not use!!!
